website_summaries.verdict: These knee pads feature EVA foam padding for heavy-duty work, with soft gel cushioning inside each pad.
pros: Sturdy double straps and quick-release clips that are easy to adjust
Pads stay put where you need them when you have to be on your knees for extended periods of time
Custom fit by adjusting 2 elastic adjustable straps
cons: Some people have trouble with the straps either breaking after a short time, cutting into the leg, or the elastic bunching up

customer_reviews.title: THE ANSWER for Iffy knees
customer_reviews.text: I've had a knee replacement and these pads are the ONLY way I can get down on my knees without it hurting like h... A must if you've had knee surgery or just bad knees. Do not buy the cheapo knee pads!! They don't have the padding you need. In this case, you really do get what you pay for-- and they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: mmwc

customer_reviews.title: I am a carpenter who spends a good part of my work day crawling across floors
customer_reviews.text: I am a carpenter who spends a good part of my work day crawling across floors. These knee pads are very comfortable and offer the protection that my knees need from constantly being on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fit , performance & the great price
customer_reviews.text: First, they fit me, that maybe seems liked ”no big deal” but I’m 6’ 8” tall & weigh over 300 pounds. I have tried a dozen different knee pads, but none fit or performed as well as these did. I have had over 6 friends or family members buy them and all have been ecstatic about them. Highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: rwfairall

customer_reviews.title: Company is honorable
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first pair ordered. Company sent a replacement pair which works perfectly. Just finished a new house project working mostly on my knees in a crawlspace. Best knee pads I ever used - for sure. Will buy from this company again. Very pleased John Phillips in Missouri
customer_reviews.author: John Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy gardening and have been using a pillow for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 72 and not 34 anymore. I enjoy gardening and have been using a pillow for my knees. I have found that a pillow does not do the job and I thought that knee pads would be the answer. I choose your pads from the reviews and agree. They are easy to put on and very comfortable. I thank you and my knees thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I do floor installations for a living, which involves me being on my knees a 90 percent of the time, I've always struggled to find resistant and comfortable kneepads, so once i decided to never buy kneepads from lowes or home depot because they wouldn't fit my needs, i tried on amazon, with these kneepads from "no cry" and i don't regret it, super comfortable, resistant and unlike other kneepads they don't bother my legs after long periods of time, if you decide to get them you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Tafolla

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable! More like yes cry
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable knee pads ever !! I'm a electrician so sometimes I need to be on my knees all day installing outlet boxes and the knee pads were not helping out at ALL They have padded support that doesnt help out all , my knees ended up all bruised up Second the straps were hurting the back of my thighs no matter how I adjusted them, Also they would not hold in place unless i tightened the straps but then that was uncomfortable I will be throwing them in the trash Now I gave them the 4 stars for durability because the front is hard plastic and would withstand being over rocks and other hard materials
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are great, I purchased to aid in the installation of a new floor. They are comfortable easy to put on and take off and were a life saver for the floor installation. 5 Stars, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rph2013

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a merchandiser, and kneeling down to stock low level shelves is incredibly uncomfortable on your knees, so I thought I'd invest in knee pads. So far, I like them. I have really skinny legs, so I was worried these might not work, but I'm able to tighten them enough so they're very snug. It's much easier to kneel down to work now. I can feel the gel in them, and they're working great! They also look pretty cool, just a little bulky on my skinny legs, but it is what it is. I will update my review in the future if necessary!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations Upon First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I ride an electric unicycle and saw another rider on YouTube with these. I've gone through many options here on Amazon including some that made me look like an Avengers character - over-armored. These aren't too small nor too big. They're just right for riding protection. I am a 4'11.5", female for reference. These cover more than my old rollerblading kneepads (pictured) yet aren't uncomfortable. The quality on first touch is immaculate. They feel very solid and a little weighty like most quality items. After riding with them, if my opinion changes I will revise my review but upon first impression, this is a solid 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Young

customer_reviews.title: High quality snd comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have used the knee pads several time and find them very comfortable. I purchased them because i recently had knee replacement surgery. I was unable to kneel without some pain. Using these knee pads allowed me to kneel with out any discomfort. I highly recommended them. Also buy cross strapping them, they stay in place even on bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: gary246

customer_reviews.title: Heavy use, nearly pain-free
customer_reviews.text: I'm a finish carpenter and use these often. After quickly going through 2 other pairs, these are holding up really well. I've had 3 knee surgeries and have psoriasis on my knees, so to be comfortable and nearly pain free at the end of the day is no small feat. The day these wear out (which I foresee to not be anytime soon), I'll definitely order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made comfortable product.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and a good attaching method making them stable and easy to use. Manufacturer was forthcoming with the fact that a particular batch of these had a shoddy attachment used on them and confirmed that if the ones I received were such, a replacement set or money back was guaranteed no questions asked. Very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for a few days doing general house maintenance and remodeling and I'm very impressed. They are very comfortable on my bad knees and stay up and in place when I'm walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped super fast. Fit secure. Slight rubbing in the outer edges of the knee when pads are worn with shorts. Due to new material. Overall will always do business with them. Also OUTSTANDING customer service, no joke or games. THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband a little over 8 months ago and he said they are the best! He wears them everyday he works and being in the automotive industry - he said they are a god send.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: Best ones I've ever tried. Sturdy elastic straps that don't look like they'll stretch out very soon. The pads themselves are hard on the ourside and soft on the inside. Just what we need!
customer_reviews.author: jim giner

customer_reviews.title: UNcomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These look to be durable being made of a hard compound, but they did not stay in place very well and they aren't the least bit comfortable. In fact kneeling on the floor without any pads would feel as good. I had previously had a pair of slip-on (Ace knee pad type) that did an excellent of staying in place and I usually wore them under loose fitting pants. They had some type of air bag cushion that was Super comfortable, but the air bag cushion blew out after short use. I would recommend that you find slip on style pads that used a more durable cushion material over this type design anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for you but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the worst knee pads I have ever tried to use. They won't stay in place even when doing as the manufacture states on all their informations posts. If you have to move around on your knees much tthey will slip around to the side of your knee no matter how tight you have the straps adjusted or crossed. In an attempt to keep them in place I had them adjusted to tight and wore raw spots on the back of my knees that are very irritating and I hope will heal without getting infected..
customer_reviews.author: Super Dave

customer_reviews.title: NO CRY, NO LIE, THEY ARE THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello my friend, I love my new No Cry knee pads!!! I bought them because I have to kneel and crawl around to put my mooring cover on my bass boat on the dock. To be honest I've only use them once, but they worked wonderful. No pressure on my knees, when I got done covering my boat, my knees felt great!!! I can't thank you enough, you deserve 5 stars* * * * * for the excellent knee pads, and for the very quick shipping, and for the follow-up emails. I like the way you do business!!! Thanks again, Your friend, Robin Hood
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood

customer_reviews.title: THESE KNEE PADS ROCK
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads rock. I'm 71years old and have very arthritic knees. I have a knee pad graveyard in my tool room. These were recommended to my by professional floor installers as they were putting hardwood floors in my home. I use them for gardening and working on my racing bicycles and they work great. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Inman

customer_reviews.title: B.S. joke of a product
customer_reviews.text: I almost lost my job thanks to these cheap horrid knee pads. Withing 1 hour 2 strap buttons popped off and almost landed in multi million dollar machinery. Absolutely not acceptable 1 hour and already broke? I wasn't rough on them literally on my knees working on machine for an hour and 2 buttons popped off, revealing a sharp needle like stem which scratched up what I was kneeling on. So pissed. DO NOT BUY if you have a important job, they will break and cause issues.
customer_reviews.author: patrick mittelstead

customer_reviews.title: Durable comfortable for all day use!
customer_reviews.text: I work in appliance repair, I am constantly on my knees cleaning out dryers changing pumps transmissions etc. I've tried 5 different type of knee pads and none of them are as durable comfortable or well made like these. 5 stars from me! Thanks no cry!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Having right knee full knee replacement I was looking for a knee cushion to use when I had to be on my knees for cleaning baseboards, gardening and doing other around the house chores. These knee pads provide the right amount of cushion, flexibility and comfort on my knees. I do place a towel under them to ensure I don't scratch the hard wood floors from the tough plastic. I do wish they had an option for a softer material on the front exterior (so I didn't need to use the towel).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with excellent protection. Nice and solid, and built to last. The straps are easy to adjust, but I haven't quite got the tension right yet, and they tend to slip down a little after my ups and downs while gardening. Fast delivery after ordering. Three months later, a button used for attaching the leg straps snapped off and can't be reattached thus making one knee pad useless. Think twice before buying this item. Five days later, I received replacement knee pads from No Cry. Excellent, fast response to what turned out to be a manufacturing problem.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Great budget knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for riding on my motorcycle. they are very durable. hope to never use them in a real situation but I'm sure that they will be enough. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lavreniuk

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: The knee pads are great. I use them all the time. When putting together Ikea furniture, I wear my knee pads, because I know it will take a while. I also use them to pull weeds. This way, I do not get as tired. After wearing them for a long time, they can start to be irritating to the skin, so maybe wear the knee pads over clothing. Lastly, this is super company. There was a problem, but the company made it right ASAP. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Protect your knees surgery is expensive and painful
customer_reviews.text: Durable, comfortable, easily adjustable, badass looking, five stars Cross the straps on the back itll prevent them from sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Issues with bands
customer_reviews.text: With gardening, I was always moving pads every two feet, I thought this would be so much better. As far as the knees, they work great. However the bands behind the leg rolls into a rope like material. I thought at first I had twisted the bands , but no, they just don't stay flat. For that reason, after 15- 20 mins, my legs are hurting from lack of blood flow. I tried to loosen the bands but then they don't stay in place walking around. If I needed these for a whole day of work, I'd be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne H.

customer_reviews.title: Repeated failure.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the first set only to have one of the cheap bottom compression attachment posts fall off on the job. The seller replaced the knee pads. In less than four hours of use the second pair failed in exactly the same manner, on both pads. Will be replacing them with another vendors offering that has better gel padding and durability. Absolutely would NOT recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Raby

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and exceptional customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: The pro knee pads are great. I bought them for gardening, and they're incredibly comfortable and work fantastic, but I'm a very small woman and they kept sliding down. I contacted customer service, and Raino not only refunded my total purchase price ... even though I had used them ... but expedited a different pair more suited to gardening to me at no charge. The gardening ones stayed up very well on my skinny legs!! Both of these products are well constructed, durable, made of quality materials, and serve the purpose better than I expected. And their customer service is exceptional. I could not recommend these products and this company more highly. You won't be disappointed that's for sure!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 year old male laying a weed barrier on 2500 SF of ground. After 1 day my knees were hurting so bad I had to knock off for a week but these knee pads made a big difference. I can work for hours at a time now and my knees are fine.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pads; even better seller
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and well padded. The challenge I had was that the straps rubbed the back of my knees because I was wearing shorts. They also tended to slip. That may have been a result of my not tightening them adequately -- again due to wearing shorts. The seller's follow up is what causes me to write a review. They are in Estonia (not China). And they actually give a damn about your satisfaction. I would highly recommend these and have no clue about what a few reviewers were experiencing in terms of discomfort. I wore these for three days on a deck and had no issues except for the straps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These kneepads are stable and sturdy. The pads inside are very comfortable and absorb the shock and weight well. The clasps are super simple yet reliable. Just cross the straps behind your knees to keep them from slipping (a good rule of thumb for any kneepads) and you're all set. No slipping and no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Grim

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After many years of saying I don't need knee pads, I wish I had bought them sooner. These are comfortable, lightweight enough and don't move around much at all. The gel padding feels nice when kneeling and the straps are easy to adjust. No complaints from me on this product. They do have plastic buckles that attach to the studs on the pad itself, but we'll see how those hold up in the future, they seem flexible so I don't think it will be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Allows senior citizen to continue hard yard work.
customer_reviews.text: At age 75, being able to do yard work on my knees is not possible without very good knee pads. As soon as these knee pads arrived, I began digging up the root system for a 20 foot tree using primarily a reciprocating saw and a small trowel because of the extensive large roots, which took several days. Sometimes I would be on my knees for three continuous hours. The knee pads are very comfortable, and I would not have been able to work that long using my previous knee pads. The root system has been removed, and I am very glad that I decided to purchase the NoCry Professional Knee Pads.
customer_reviews.author: ex-bomber guy

customer_reviews.title: I was sceptical, but I was pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.text: I went into buying this item skeptical because I am a 6'2" 320lb FB player with thick legs. For reference my legs are 27" at the thigh, 21" at the knee cap, 19" at the nape of the knee, and 21" at the calf. I have to say the quality and sizing of this item is top notch. They are designed well, cover the important parts and ligaments of the knees and they fit comfortably. I use these for gardening and home repairs. The packaging is professional with a bit of charm. This is a quality product. I did a lot of comparisons and research, I'm sold on these for my future needs.
customer_reviews.author: Leonidas

customer_reviews.title: NoCry Professional Knee Pads with Heavy Duty...
customer_reviews.text: knee pads work very well, when cleaning my containers of debri falling leaves that sorta of thing, and doing regular maintenance of the container these are a God send, especially with the knees.I would recommend these to all gardeners who spend time on the hard ground or any chore that calls for kneeling on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: howd2u

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons ti these knee pads.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Senior Citizen gardener and bought these for kneeling in flower beds. Positive: -easy adjustability of straps -dirt snd mud from the garden cleans out of the grooves easily. Negative: -pads stayed in place when I wore cotton jeans but slipped down when I wore polyester leggings. -not quite enough padding for arthritic knees. -the upper strap bunched up after 3 wearings becoming uncomfortable like a thin band when I tightened it up enough to stop slippage.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN BOWMAN

customer_reviews.title: I read the instructions . . . Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with my right knee. I've tried other knee protection devices that always ended up around my ankles. The instructions of this NoCry product suggested using the "criss cross" method of strapping them on so and I did with my right knee. After a long work day, the knee pad was still there on my knee, and had honestly forgotten I was wearing it! Good job NoCry !!
customer_reviews.author: Imageman

customer_reviews.title: Get em you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and fit perfectly. I appreciate the sellers attention to detail and I think these will last thru my lifetime of work
customer_reviews.author: PalanHighcounsel

customer_reviews.title: Grommet Failure
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these less than a year ago. I only used them over the summer months. This spring one of the grommets on the right pad fell off, so only one strap is functioning. As. a result, it does not sit properly on my knee. I only use it for gardening, so it seems it should have lasted longer than less than 4 month wear. I sent a message to the manufacture, but did not receive a response. My neighbor wanted a pair, so I explained what had happened to mine. She still wanted a pair, so I ordered her a pair this week. I did not reorder a pair for me due to my disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, plan to adjust frequently
customer_reviews.text: Good knee pads if you stay on your knees. Moving around they tend to slip down and one has to keep pulling them back in place, even if moving around on your knees! Very frustrating, however it is better than beating up your knees and shortening the time before surgery is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knees while painting my entire home
customer_reviews.text: Took on the task of painting my entire home including the trim. This requires many hours on the knees. I’m a big guy and being on my knees for too long can be very uncomfortable and painful. These knee pads really helped make this process easy. They’ve allowed me to stay on my knee for an hour straight. After wearing them for 2-3 days in a row I do get a bit of rawness in my knees, but I think that’s inevitable. I’d definitely recommend this knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: WILL BRUISE YOU BADLY!!! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for doing flooring for 2 8hr days. The backs of my knees were so bruised I couldn’t touch them because of the sheer pain from the bruising. I tried crossing the straps as some had suggested and also non-crossed in the back. Both ways basically cut into my legs. The very hard plastic knee cap transferred that force right into my own knee cap negating the reason for wearing knee pads. So the front of my knees ended up badly bruised and sore for several days after wearing these. Worse pair of knee pads I have ever worn!! I don’t know how all these people are giving these things such great reviews???? They are terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Protective
customer_reviews.text: These seem really comfortable having used them once on a tile floor. The outside shell is hard which will give good protection although time will tell if the outside shell gets scratched up on abrasive surfaces. The best part is that the straps are adjustable then clip on which is far better than trying to adjust them every time.
customer_reviews.author: MNDoc

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable when kneeling on them
customer_reviews.text: I thought they looked a little bulky and felts a bit bulky at first. But when I actual used them at work, wow what a difference they made when I had to kneel on them. They are great! I have only wore them once and my job is pretty physical so we will see how durable they really are over time.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best kneepads I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I like these kneepads a lot. I'm up and down all day working concrete construction and these kneepads are really comfortable. I also want to mention the fantastic customer service. I bought my first pair of noCry kneepads and the buckles fell off, however I contacted them and they assured me they had fixed the issue and sent me a new pair right away. I had a new pair of kneepads within 2 days of contacting them. So far the new pair is working great. I absolutely recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Egan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible knee pads
customer_reviews.text: These knees pad did not meet my expectations, the gel padding are super thin and uncomfortable on the knee used it for an 8 hour shift and my knees were hurting terrible, it also keeps riding under the knee no matter which way you strap it, not meant for people in the MILLWRIGHTS trade
customer_reviews.author: Andrea G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable knee pads
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads have worked well for me the first couple of times I used them. The attachment points seem fine - I haven't experienced them sliding down my legs. They are pretty comfortable, and the shell seems to be very protective. I'm a weekend warrior, so I don't use these every day, but they have been great for me so far. By the way, customer service has been stellar, as well. They checked in with me twice after I made the purchase to see if I was happy. It's a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: gwrosenb

customer_reviews.title: Saved my knees
customer_reviews.text: I’m 70 years old so when I work on my riding mower and get down on my knees on the concrete with my jeans. My knees would kill me for days. Just received the “No-Cry” Knee Pads and have used them Once. Boy! It sure did make a tremendous difference. Wish I had bought them years ago. I would highly recommend them to anyone that does a lot of work while crawling around on their knees. The owner of “No-Cry” contacted me offering tips on using them and asking if I needed anything further. That’s customer service! A plus!
customer_reviews.author: Leo Kirk

customer_reviews.title: NoCry Black Plastic Kneepads
customer_reviews.text: When you have to kneel for carpentry jobs or home repairs, having these kneepads is a knee and pain saver. I have bought the Home Depot kneepads, and those are too stiff and tend to wobble on my knees when I kneel. These kneepads have a bit more give and flexibility, so you knees actually get better protection. As we get older, or if we want to keep working longer, having these kneepads and other aids are a super help.
customer_reviews.author: EarthPlanner

customer_reviews.title: 1, 2, buckle my knee pads good to go
customer_reviews.text: Doing appliance repair has me on me knees a lot. These knee pads are awesome, they’re comfortable and definitely convenient to unbuckle or buckle quickly. The no Velcro helps with them looking clean and not having to worry about it attaching to random stuff. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: blookazoowill

customer_reviews.title: impressed....
customer_reviews.text: can't even remember what year I bought these in 2-3 ago I think). But I'm just now comin around to my Amazon reviews lol. My hubby is in construction and is STILL using them. That means 1-they hold up. 2-durability (which for him is huge cause nothin lasts with than wonderful man lol). 3- he's still usin them so they're comfy enough. His knees still hurt I've noticed if he's on them all day thou so 4stars instead of 5 for that.
customer_reviews.author: Italiana

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had a knee replacement last fall and kneeling on the replaced knee feels very strange and I was hesitant to put any weight on that knee. With these knee pads on I don't even think about the knee and have used them on floors,in the garden and even on jagged rocks in the yard. Easy on and off, very comfortable. They sit right on my workbench and first thing I grab when I know I may have to get on a knee. Top quality and a real knee saver !!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed and quality product. The supplier contacted me asking if the product was satisfactory and if not how they could 'make it right'. Even mentioned a possible defect and if so, would replace immediately. Have used the pads to lay down a new floor and they saved the knees / jeans. They attach easily and stay put once adjusted. Mobility is always an issue w/ kneepads, but these don't present any physical problems or inconveniences. Well worth the cost for quality pads.
customer_reviews.author: Arcturus

customer_reviews.title: These knee pads are wonderful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 74 years old with a knee replacement and depend on knee pads whenever I need to get on my hands and knees in the house or doing my gardening. These knee pads are wonderful and comfortable. No slipping due to the strap construction. I took the suggestion from No Cry and cross them for extra stability. My old ones had velcro straps which curled and wore down. These are much better and easy to adjust. Also the company sent me an email with suggestions showing me that they take pride in their product as well as satisfaction of the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding knee pads
customer_reviews.text: These have a thick gel padding that is so much more comfortable than the old type w/ dense foam. The "hard" outer shell is very sturdy and protective against rocks, etc. The straps don't pinch the backs of my legs like others I have had and the straps are extra long to fit a wide range of sizes. They do stay up better with the straps crisscrossed but are not quite as comfortable to me worn like that. These wrap around the sides of your legs enough to keep the straps from digging in your legs. These are priced well based on the quality of materials and construction. Will definitely buy again if I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: J.h.B.d.

customer_reviews.title: Disposable?
customer_reviews.text: I must admit at my advanced age it felt good to garden and screw in deck screws with the knee pads on. However, after about 10 hours of being on my knees on garden dirt or the soft wood of cedar - no concrete usage - one of the buttons that the strap hooked onto fell off. I don't know exactly when it popped off because I had a hard time finding it in the grass Once that occurred that pad was useless - doesn't work with one strap at all. I still have one - but I always seem to put it on the side that needs it the least.
customer_reviews.author: Lab Rat

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT! Now I was a little hesitant because people were saying some of the tabs were popping off. However I did notice the seller was taking care of those customers. I've had these now for a few weeks and have had zero problems. I work for the railroad and we don't work on smooth surfaces. No matter how rough the ground is, I feel nothing but comfort in these pads. So far there isn't even a scratch on the pads and the cushion doesn't seem like it's losing any comfort. I was gonna pay so much more for a pair of 5.11's, I'm really glad I went with these. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just received these this week and used them for the first time today. I spent about 3 hours on my knees. These pads never slipped nor did they become uncomfortable in the least. I have bad knees; but these pads allowed me to work with no knee pain or discomfort. I do not know how they will hold up over time; however, they are worth the price just for the comfort I experienced today.
customer_reviews.author: Texas88Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad knees cant put no pressure on them and I never bend down on my knees and havent in around 4 years . But recently I started building a new 10x24 deck on my house and I knew that I would have to be on my knees putting down the deck boards so I used them for over 6 hours straight . If I knew that they would have helped like that I would have ordered them along time ago . Awesome product .
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Could Use a Pair I’d Knee Pads
customer_reviews.text: Always thought the best time to buy some items is when you don’t need them. This was the case with these knee pads. After knee surgery, it doesn’t take much to aggravate that knee. I’m still pretty active and do moderate yard work. I expect I will get good use out of these knee pads but have not had the opportunity to use them yet. I have tried them on and they do seem very comfortable and fit well. I will use them for occasional use and expect they will hold up well. I purchased these knee pads as well as the waterproof knee pads. I’ll update this review once I put some miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: NavyVeteran20

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Best knee pads I’ve ever purchased. Great customer service, too. Stop looking at the other options and just buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Knee pads i have found
customer_reviews.text: I am a DIY and over the years have done many projects that require being on my knees for long periods. Needless to say i have tried many different knee pads and was never comfortable until i tried these. They fit really well, dont move around when you are using them and provide enough support that you can concentrate on the task at hand. In fact i liked them so much that my first pair i bought i gave to my son and i went and bought a second pair for myself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: stu ross

customer_reviews.title: Great for my bad knees
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are great. I've got worn out knees and could not kneel down and get back up. I've tried cheap knee pads in the past and wasn't pleased. Now I can get on my knees to take low angle pictures of dogs and cars again. Thank you NoCry!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thane

customer_reviews.title: Slide down.
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to rate durability. The work activity was digging post holes and installing a picket fence. These knee pads are comfortable and work well when they stay in place; however, I was constantly pulling them up. I crossed the straps and still had to pull them up. Pulling them tighter than normal helps with the stability but the tension does not hold. In my opinion, these knee pads need a different type of strap and tensioner.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Oh My God ! My knees thank you!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for my poor abused fifty year old knees.Just laid a room full of flooring upstairs at my house . Up down stairs to cut and plop back down on my knees, these took a beating. So well fitting and made sturdy yet comfortable. I broke a similar pair I had for a very long time(years) that were a sears brand of yesteryear. I searched for months until these. Two pair of crap pads from another manufacturer,one broke right away,and the other ill fitting and unwearable.Not to mention the customer service from this company. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads work better than others I've purchased. I bought a Large. I'm I55 lbs and my knees are slightly larger than they should because of arthritis. I try to stay off my knees, however, that's not always possible, for me anyway, because I tend a large garden. At present, I'm cleaning up the debris from winter and cultivating, much of which requires kneeling. The knee pads fit me, they don't slide down and they're comfortable. The inside has a cushion that gives just enough. So far they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Raingirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for the regular or occasional user. Has been a life saver for my knees!
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Button/ Rivets pop out in first 10 uses!
customer_reviews.text: Save your time and money and dont buy these knee pads!! Until No Cry stops using rivets/buttons (that fall out when trying to attach the leg straps rendering the pad useless as shown above) and switch to VELCRO to secure the pad to the leg this product is a failure!! To the companies credit they comped me a replacement pair when the anchor bottons popped off the pad the first time, but then the same dang thing happened on the replacement pair!!! Its a shame b/c the rest of the pad is well made/cushioned. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and priced amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Nov. 2019 and its now end of May 2020. These have been the most comfortable knee pads I've worn. I'm an hvac tech and weigh about 230lbs and had an acl and mcl repair recently. These have been great. The hard shell will make you slide a little bit of smooth surfaces. I'm now just starting to debate if i should buy a replacement pair. Seems like maybe the geñ padding shifted?
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a pro. So if your a tile setter or roofer and needs something daily ask your peer. I wasn't using knee pads but urgently needed some for some roof and flooring work I was working on. I love the pads. the gel cusions work wonders. Do not wear these with shorts!!! The straps will schafe the backs of the knee area and you'll wish you hadn't. Seems like they could improve the straps to possibly up-grading to leather straps, again with long sturdy pants. Mine have only been used a few times and are showing signs of wear, but I've now loosened them up alot. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer fan

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.text: Theses are so COMFORTABLE! Much more so than the pair I had! I highly recommend these. Update: When wearing shorts on a hot summer day I found my knees sweating making the knee pads slippery when crawling on the ground. Update: when wearing with shorts these knee pads got slippery on hot sweaty days! And when it was a cooler day, after a short time they started to make my knees raw!! I put egg crate foam in them to stop that!!
customer_reviews.author: The Zoo Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Product is not good for flooring install
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a three star review only because of customer service. The product provides no comfort to my knees, and I was wearing shorts and the material ripped my leg hairs out. I sent the company a note, they refunded my order and sent me floor specific knee pads. I used the floor specific knee pads and they worked fine for a few hours, but the longer you're working the less comfort they provided. My leg hair was not ripped out, but my knees were in a lot of pain. Site did say they would take my criticism into account and work on making a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Chenslee

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and price on point!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these while loading luggage in the belly of a plane where you not only have to be on your knees, but shuffling around quickly to stack luggage. The ones that were given to him hurt, these he says are amazingly comfortable. We did have an issue with a rivet on one pair, but the seller even points out that they are working on that in the description which is stellar. They were quick to respond and resolve. Great price, great customer service, superior comfort and only a small quality flaw that is backed by the guarantee with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: House Manager

customer_reviews.title: I agree with the many five star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I read the many reviews before purchasing for my "ultra hard to please" husband for Father's Day. Turns out a big job came up at our house and before he could dig out his old knee pads I presented him with these three days early. I am elated that he absolutely loves this gift! I also enclosed the emails regarding use and warranty sent to me by the company. He gave the knee pads a vigorous work out two days straight and he's still smiling so a big thumbs up to buy these with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: jrice

customer_reviews.title: Great knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible knees and I bought these for a warrior dash to protect myself from crawling obstacles. I love them! Suuuuper comfy and stayed in place while I was running!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great when new but elastic bunches
customer_reviews.text: These are great knee pads when new. I used them to install two floors during my remodel. They are initially very comfortable. The problem I had was that in order for them to stay in place I need to tighten the straps fairly tightly. I tried it with straps crossed and uncrossed, no difference. Unfortunately, the tightness causes the elastic to bunch and take several permanent creases. Instead of being a 2 inch wide strap it's now about 1/2 inches. This caused significant chaffing and blistering on the backs of my knees. Ouch! The pads themselves are still very comfortable but I can't wear them for any length of time anymore due to the creases in the elastic.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor work!
customer_reviews.text: Good kneepads, very comfortable and do well for landscaping projects unless you are in a rock bed. The hard outside plastic definitely protected my knees so I could do hands and knees weeding. The hard plastic, however, made them a little unstable on hard slick or uneven surface such as larger gravel and even on the kitchen tile floor. They felt like they could slip out from under me. On grass, mulch, concrete, and other places, they were great. Also, the buckle strap system is nice, no issues with the "buttons" falling off or anything. I also like that I can pop them off easily when I'm done with them. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mys

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and comfortable but cheaply made straps
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in construction/carpentry and needed durable pads. Upon receiving them he tried them out and raves about the comfort. The first day he worked in them the straps are fraying in one of the pads. Did not expect them to be indestructible and they were very inexpensive, but dissatisfied that they are tearing up after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Good

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction, but...
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads are wonderfully well constructed, very sturdy, easy to put on and take off and cushion my knees superbly well when I'm kneeling on my bathroom floor, or any other floor including concrete, to clean it. However, I can't walk around in them because they hurt the area of my legs just above my knees. I've tried adjusting them higher and lower on my legs to no avail. I suspect my knees are too small for these wonderful knee pads. I'm sadly returning them. However, I think for most men they would work fine. BTW, I also have very short legs which is probably part of my problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Save your knees
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these for long, but I did give them a good test. I got a note from the seller on wearing them, and crossing the straps is a good thing to try. They are very secure on your knees and they are super comfortable for your knees and rock hard on the outside. They are easy to get on and off. I wore them on a cooler afternoon and they also kept my knees warm to the point of sweating. I am not sure how you can avoid that with the cushioning they provide. These are well worth having to prvent displacing your knee cap.
customer_reviews.author: Andy LaCombe

customer_reviews.title: This is not it
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very high review score which seems odd to me because I ordered these a couple days ago and when I tried them on they are not comfortable at all the pas has no flexibility to it and will slide around your knee with every move you make, I work for a company where I have tried different performance gear and this is not it I don’t give low scores on amazon unless it was a horrible product but this product needs more flexibility and comfort foam cushion inside. 2 star buy
customer_reviews.author: Tyron J.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when I was installing a vinyl laminate plank floor in our house. These are really comfortable to kneel in and are plenty durable for all types of use. I think you have to wear long pants with these as the straps would be uncomfortable on your legs if you were wearing shorts. I was adjusting the straps after kneeling/standing/kneeling/standing but minor inconvenience - maybe a sleeve type, instead of strap type, knee pad would stay in position better? I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Off the chart, customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the knee pads that should be used for hardscape projects, like stone or bricks. In with the pads was an envelope from the manufacturer, No Cry. It explained, if not satisfied, with your purchase to notify them. I did, because I was going to use the pads for an indoor project, installing vinyl flooring, and was afraid the pads would scratch my flooring. NO Cry replied the same day, and forwarded me the correct knee pads, THE SAME DAY. I have never worked with a company that was so helpful, in my life. I look forward to using more of the No Cry products. That you Raino, for your assistance, at No Cry.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Mike

customer_reviews.title: STUPID DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: The knee pad was comfortable. I wore them for 4 hour intervals at a time for 4 days. The button which holds the top strap popped off. Now the knee pad has a sharp metal pin sticking out. The other buttons the straps hook on are difficult to release. One additional problem I had them slipping down a lot. Overall, I can not recommend them. Look for something with the gel padding but a velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Completely blown away by the quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away by the quality of these knee pads. I took them into the woods to do some bushcraft camping and spent a lot of time on my knees building fires, digging holes, wood crafting various things as well as breaking firewood with my knees. After spending a lot of time scraping and crawling along rocky ground and really abusing these pads, not only did it feel like I was crawling on a cushion no matter what I crawled on, but the pads were hardly scratched after I cleaned all the dirt off of them. Super comfortable well fitting knee pads. I can't say enough about the quality of them. They were a winning purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great if you file down the clips
customer_reviews.text: These knee pads work great - they feel great and stay in place pretty well. BUT when I first got them I filed out the clips so they don't grip the buttons so tightly. As they came they were too tight and would have probably pulled out the buttons with time. I noticed multiple posts that this happened to others with these knee pads. The clips grip the buttons so tightly that you have to pull hard to get them to unsnap and this will end up pulling out the buttons. I have another brand of knee pads where this happened.
customer_reviews.author: StreamReader

customer_reviews.title: rivots keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because the straps did not have velcro. First set a rivot came off the first day of use. . Sent them back and got a replacement and the rivot came off after 2 days on the job. They say they will replace without return but amazon told me to return. Nice design, straps great, strap attachment points weak. I will use the one that has not failed yet with an old Harbor freight knee pad. bad purchase please don't do this to yourself.
customer_reviews.author: len p

customer_reviews.title: Read all the comments on the straps.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in July 2019 for my grandson who works in the dairy dept at a major food store. After a few weeks of being used about 20 hrs per week, the strap broke. For the price, they should be more sturdy. For me, it was a waste of money. Disappointe. Update. I received a new pair. I did not ask or expect to be sent a replacement pair. This is customer service at its best. Now you deserve 6 stars. My grandson was delighted. No more sore knees. The cookie is cute.😀
customer_reviews.author: winnie reed

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable knee pads
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these a few times caulking the gap between the driveway and garage as well as pulling up flooring in the house and they were comfortable even though I was wearing shorts during both jobs. I was looking to replace a pair of knee pads I bought 10+ years ago and these are so much more comfortable to wear. Another thing I noticed is that the knee pads did not slip as I was wearing them. My old pair constantly had to be adjusted when I would get up and move around.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell J

customer_reviews.title: wont stay put
customer_reviews.text: just like the cheap ones i have they wont stay up. i lay a lot of floor and am constantly up and down. every time I get up they fall below my knee caps. i have the straps so tight they are uncomfortable. only good thing about them is I can be on my knees for a while and they dont hurt. pretty sturdy well padded but those straps!! i dont recommend. there has to be a better way
customer_reviews.author: doug955

customer_reviews.title: Saves My Knees from Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought the protectors a few years back to use when I had to crawl on hands and knees on my boat to set the cover poles in place. I used them again today which prompted this review. I have found them to be very effective in protecting my knees from immediate and residual pain from being on my knees without protection. I use them whenever I need to get on my knees on hard surfaces and I find that they not only protect my knees from pain but they make it easier to get up. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SML Dave

customer_reviews.title: My knees don’t hurt!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these to work in the garden. But decided to use them for an indoor project. My knees didn’t hurt after being on my knees almost two hours. My only issue is that they were slippery on my kitchen floor. So I placed newspapers on the floor which provided some traction.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: About 2 hours in to a retaining wall.
customer_reviews.text: So, busted a pair of knee pads I bought last summer to put in a patio. Looked at Amazon hoping to buy the same set, I liked them, truly. I’m pretty stoked now that I found these instead! I’ve been putting in a 40’ long retaining wall all morning, kneeling in landscaping rock and typical suburban construction concrete seeds you didn’t know you had.... AT ANY RATE, these knee pads have performed at 100% satisfaction so far. I’ve been kneeling in nasty, dirty, sharp edges and you wouldn’t know it looking at the pads OR my knees. That said, I definitely expect to get more than 1 summer’s worth of projects out of these pads. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carl 338

customer_reviews.title: Good knee pads for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good knee pads, used them to put down 900sq ft of laminate flooring. At first they felt great and were fine but as the day went on they kept shifting on my knees to the side probably the way I was moving. The straps are very easy to put on and adjust but after a while they were digging into the back of my legs again probably I had them too tight to keep them from shifting. I’m 6’2” and 270 and put a hurting on these pads. Over all they were the best I have ever owned and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Cool

customer_reviews.title: Your knees will thank you
customer_reviews.text: These things have saved my knees! I have tendinitis in both knees from running track, and if I’m scuffling around on my knees working on stuff, they’ll kill me for the next few days. I bought these primarily for working on my truck so I can slide around on my knees, but they’re so comfortable I’ll pull them out anytime my knees will touch the ground. So far, they’re holding up great, and I have no issues with them sliding around as I move around. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G Money

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING to cry about!
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy and so soft. I walked around on my knees for a bit to test them - total comfort. Easy to adjust, easy to wear. It will be a while before I know how they hold up but the company is very responsive. After I saw the black envelope with red sticker and read the packaging insert, I wrote to compliment them on the packaging and with questions about a slight difference in the padding on each knee pad. I got a reply from Raino within 24 hours offering to replace if the padding was not enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: ShareOn

customer_reviews.title: best knee pads i have used yet
customer_reviews.text: im a meter reader for a utility. i walk, a lot. i have to get on my knees off and on throughout the day. my previous knee pads needed constant adjustment as they would constantly slide down. these hold their place very well. they need very little adjustment throughout the day, and im talking after 8 miles of walking and bending and kneeling etc.. they are very sturdy yet are comfortable and look good as well. super please with the purchase and well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: steve m

product_meta.title: NoCry Professional Knee Pads with Heavy Duty Foam Padding and Comfortable Gel Cushion, Strong Double Straps and Adjustable Easy-Fix Clips
feature_bullets: EASY TO ADJUST FOR A TIGHT, SECURE FIT. Flexible neoprene straps and an ergonomic design keep the knee pads snugly in place all day long. Plus, the quick release slip buckle clips make putting on and taking off your pads a snap
DESIGNED FOR COMFORT AND SAFETY. Soft gel core and durable EVA foam padding cushion your knees for hours on end. A heavy-duty thick poly shield protects against cuts or scrapes on any terrain
USE AT HOME OR ON THE JOB. Ideal for working on concrete and hardwood floors, construction work, flooring and carpet installations, welding, stocking shelves, gardening, cleaning, and more
BUILT TO WITHSTAND HEAVY USE. Heavy-weight nylon thread ensures long-lasting durability. 600D polyester mesh breathes for all-day comfort

IMPORTANT. We’ve discovered an issue with the attachment rivets popping off when in use. We have managed to reduce the rate of these defective knee pads considerably, but not yet completely. We feel very bad about it and are actively working on solutions. If you receive a defective product, contact us, and we will immediately send you a replacement unit for free. No return required.

specifications.Material: PVC, EVA foam, neoprene, 600D polyester, soft gel
specifications.Included Components: 1 pair of NoCry Professional Knee Pads
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,052 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
